name: Lorelei Pokemon Masters EX
description:
This Lora was created using my local kohya instead of the colab, took some time to get all the settings right.

Training based on Anything v3 checkpoint so it works with most anime-like checkpoints.

You only need to type the trigger word 'EXLorelei' and it will generate a fairly accurate image of her. However, the outfit might have some inconsistencies. If you want to make her look more like her version in Pokemon Masters, you will still need to use secondary prompts. Even though I removed all the red-haired samples in the training data, her hair still appears somewhat red. But nothing you prompt gods can't fix.

To recreate her outfit with 100% accuracy, check the prompts and the negatives on the examples shown here. The strength of this Lora is quite high, at 0.8, while anything below 0.3 is too low. I recommend using a value between 0.5 and 0.7.

Don't think I will update this LORA tho, just wanted to test running the whole thing on my pc.

meta.prompt: <lora:EXLorelei:0.7>  EXLorelei, orange hair, solo, purple skirt,  resort background
meta.negativePrompt: dress, animal ears, ((loli)), towel, cape, bad artist, ugly, disfigured, deformed, poorly drawn, low quality eyes, lowres, ((bad anatomy)), bad hands, text, error, missing fingers, extra digit, worst quality, low quality, normal quality, jpeg artifacts , blurry, bad face, hat, ((child face)),((young, kid)), (baby face), spiky hair, multiple legs, watermark, signature, architecture, badhandv4, easynegative, ng_deepnegative_v1_75t , verybadimagenegative_v1.3, badv3, badv4, nylon, black thigh high, bed, lying down, swimsuit, black hair, leotard, one piece swimsuit, coat, long gloves, flowers, plants, trees, NATURE, pants, long sleeves , sleeves long skirt
